DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect 30 hour cognitive remediation program young patient early phase schizophrenia spectrum disorder cognitive , clinical functional outcome measure . The remediation program integrate whatever active rehabilitation participant currently attend ( school , work , day program etc ) .
DOC.criteria: Early phase schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , psychosis NOS Less 5 year since start adequate treatment psychotic disorder Age 1840 Norwegian speaking ( sufficiently understand complete assessment ) Traumatic brain injury Neurological disorder determine medical history IQ 70
